pageProduct.name: Silicea+ One A Day Hair Skin Nails 30 x 15ml Oral Gel Sachets
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Silicea+ One a Day Sachets are the newest and most convenient way to take silicea gel for skin, hair and nails yet! No refrigeration required! No Mixing required! Take directly from sachet. Enjoy the same daily intake of Silicea from our ULTRA capsule or daily dose from Silicea 500ml bottle now in a ready-to-go beauty shot sachet with a tear-off tab. With added Biotin and Selenium as well as the great taste of mixed berries. Does not contain artificial sweeteners, gluten, lactose or preservatives. Vegan and Vegetarian friendly. Suitable during Pregnancy. Quality made in Germany.

Warnings

Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet. Do not use if sachet seal is broken. Store below 25 Deg C

Ingredients

Silicon Dioxide (silicea) 420mg, Biotin (Vitamin H) 8ug, Selenium 18ug.
Fruit Juice blend of : strawberry, raspberry, blackcurrant, elderberry and red grape.

Directions

Adults and children over 12 years of age take one (1) sachet contents per day, or as directed by your healthcare professional.
